verbose_text: Studies have indicated that miR-21 can not only promote fibroblasts proliferation, migration and collagen synthesis XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR, but also enhance the angiogenic activities of endothelial cells XREF_BIBR, both of which are beneficial for wound healing.
